file_content.text: What kind of prison is this?
It's no prison. This is where Arcann keeps all his most prized possessions.
Possessions.
Yes, don't you feel special now?
Starting to really bustle out here!
Koth, Vaylin's arrived.
Already? Okay, let me know the second you hit the lift.
What's the story with Koth? He's not Imperial....
He used to serve in Zakuul's military. Now he's dedicated his life to ending Arcann's reign.
Why? What did Arcann do to him?
You can ask him yourself, provided we make it out of here alive.
Guards = diverted // Security codes = scrambled
Excellent work, Teeseven. Keep at it.
We have to get across that bridge.
Catastrophic reactor failure imminent.
Evacuate the tower. Achieve minimum safe distance.
Reactor instability detected. Emergency evacuation is in effect.
What happened to the reactor? That wasn't you, was it?
Vaylin happened.
Vaylin did that? Guess you were right about your Outlander!
Koth, what's your status?
Hostiles on my tail still, but I've got tricks they haven't seen yet. Whoa!
Koth? Koth.
That one they've seen before. Got to go, I'll keep my ears on!
We're going to die!
Go wait for Koth!
I'm not leaving you!
We must leave!
This is pure insanity!
It isn't working!
So much for the cover-of-darkness theory.
So much for the chaos providing cover.
Vaylin's nothing if not persistent.
Your crimes will not go unpunished!
Stand down and face justice!
Lower your weapons and admit defeat!
Pathetic assassin!
You don't deserve to live!
For our fallen emperor!
Press the attack!
A Skytrooper factory, Koth!
What's that?
You sent us into a Skytrooper manufacturing plant!
And here I had all the time in the world to plot out a new escape route!
